dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2319 : Native American Veterans’ Memorial Amendments Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To clarify certain provisions of the Native American Veterans’ Memorial Establishment Act of 1994.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Native American Veterans’ Memorial Amendments Act of 2013.

subsection.text: Section 3 of the Native American Veterans’ Memorial Establishment Act of 1994 (20 U.S.C. 80q–5 note; 108 Stat. 4067) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), by striking within the interior structure of the facility provided for by and inserting on property under the jurisdiction of the Museum on the site described in; and
in subsection (c)(1), by striking , in consultation with the Museum, is and inserting and the National Museum of the American Indian are.

subsection.text: Section 4(a) of the Native American Veterans’ Memorial Establishment Act of 1994 (20 U.S.C. 80q–5 note; 108 Stat. 4067) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the heading, by inserting and National Museum of the American Indian after American Indians; and
in the first sentence, by striking shall be solely and inserting and the National Museum of the American Indian shall be.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 11, 2013.
